name: Ouroboros (itch) (dreamlogician)
description:
The snake game with a twist! Extend your length by collecting hearts, or by threading through your own body.

[Controls]

Player 1 - Q (left), W (right)
Player 2 - O (left), P (right)
Player 3 - Z (left), X (right)
Player 4 - N (left), M (right)
Player 5 - A (left), S (right)
Player 6 - K (left), L (right)
Player 7 - E (left), R (right)
Player 8 - U (left), I (right)
Player 9 - D (left), F (right)
Player 10 - H (left), J (right)

[Credits]

dreamlogician - design & code
The Bonsai Treehouse - art
